text: Valentina Cortese (1 January 1923 - 10 July 2019) was an Italian actress. She was known for her roles in The Glass Mountain, Thieves' Highway, The House on Telegraph Hill, and in The Barefoot Contessa. She was a BAFTA Award in 1973 and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1975 for her role in Night for Day. Cortese died on 10 July 2019 in Milan at the age of 96.Addio Valentina Cortese, l'ultima diva ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Milan Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Italian movie actors
title: Valentina Cortese
